name: climsubc2mpt
params: setvar s0, class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4, wff w0
body: |- wi(w0, wbr(cmpt(s0, c0, co(c1, cmin, c2)), cli, co(c3, cmin, c2)))
-| wi(w0, wbr(cmpt(s0, c0, c1), cli, c3))

stmt.origin: climsubmpt(s0, c0, c1, c2, c3, c2, c4, w0)

|- wi(w0, wbr(cmpt(s0, c0, co(c1, cmin, c2)), cli, co(c3, cmin, c2)))
-| wnf(s0, w0)
-| wceq(c0, cfv(cuz, c4))
-| wi(w0, wcel(c4, cz))

-| wi(w0, wbr(cmpt(s0, c0, c1), cli, c3))
-| wi(w0, wbr(cmpt(s0, c0, c2), cli, c2))
-| diffsc(s0, c0)

-| wi(w0, wcel(c2, cc))

comment: Limit of the difference of two converging sequences. (Contributed by Glauco Siliprandi, 8-Apr-2021.)
